report.name: x_simulImmo

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
SELECT decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(s.pid,4,' '),s.pid) as Ligne_Imputee, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(s.metier,3,' '),s.metier) metier, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.codsg,7,0), s.codsg) dpg_ligne_code, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(si.libdsg,30,' '),si.libdsg) dpg_ligne_libelle, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.dpcode,5,0),s.dpcode) dp_code, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(dp.dplib,50,' '),dp.dplib) dp_libelle, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(nvl(dp.typdp,' '),2,' '),dp.typdp) dp_categorie, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(nvl(to_char(dp.datimmo,'DD/MM/YYYY'),' '),10,' '),dp.datimmo) dp_date_immo, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(nvl(dpc.dp_copi,' '),6,0),dpc.dp_copi) dpcopi_code, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(nvl(axe.libelle,' '),50,' '),axe.libelle) axe_strategique , decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(nvl(fin.libelle,' '),50,' '),fin.libelle) type_financement, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(pi.icpi,5,' '),pi.icpi) proj_code, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(pi.ilibel,50,' '),pi.ilibel) proj_libelle, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.codcamo,6,0),s.codcamo) ca_payeur_code, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(ca.clibrca,16,' '),ca.clibrca) ca_payeur_libelle, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.codsgress,7,0),s.codsgress) dpg_ress_code, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(si_ress.libdsg,30,' '),si_ress.libdsg) dpg_ress_libelle, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(si_ress.cafi,6,0), si_ress.cafi) cafi, -- FAD PPM 65049 : Non réstitution des données RESSOURCES --decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.ident,6,0),s.ident) ress_code, DECODE( :P_PARAM0, 'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsgress,:P_PERIME), 'O', decode( :p_param6, '.TXT', rpad(s.ident,6,' '), s.ident ), DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi(si_ress.cafi,:P_PERIM_CAFI), 'N', '', decode( :p_param6, '.TXT', rpad(s.ident,6,' '), s.ident ) ) ), '' ) ress_code, DECODE( :P_PARAM0, 'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsgress,:P_PERIME), 'O', decode( :p_param6, '.TXT', rpad(r.rnom,30,' '), r.rnom ), DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi(si_ress.cafi,:P_PERIM_CAFI), 'N', '', decode( :p_param6, '.TXT', rpad(r.rnom,30,' '), r.rnom ) ) ), '' ) ress_nom, --s.rtype ress_type, DECODE( :P_PARAM0, 'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsgress,:P_PERIME), 'O', s.rtype, DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi(si_ress.cafi,:P_PERIM_CAFI), 'N', '', s.rtype ) ), '' ) ress_type, decode(:p_param6,'TXT',rpad(s.prestation,3,' '),s.prestation) ress_qualif, DECODE( :P_PARAM0, 'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsgress,:P_PERIME), 'O', nvl(s.niveau,' '), DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi(si_ress.cafi,:P_PERIM_CAFI), 'N', '', nvl(s.niveau,' ') ) ), '' ) ress_niveau, --decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(s.soccode,4,' '),s.soccode) ress_sts_code, DECODE( :P_PARAM0, 'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsgress,:P_PERIME), 'O', decode( :p_param6, '.TXT', rpad(s.soccode,4,' '), s.soccode ), DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi(si_ress.cafi,:P_PERIM_CAFI), 'N', '', decode( :p_param6, '.TXT', rpad(s.soccode,4,' '), s.soccode ) ) ), '' ) ress_sts_code, decode(s.soccode,'SG..',decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(0,12,' '),0),decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.coutftht,12,' '),s.coutftht)) ress_cout_HT, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.coutfthtr,12,' '),s.coutfthtr)ress_cout_htr, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(nvl(s.coutenv,0),12,' '),nvl(s.coutenv,0) )ress_cout_env, to_char(s.cdeb,'YYYYMM') mois, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',rpad(s.typetap,2,' '),s.typetap) etape_type_code, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.consojh,12,' '),s.consojh) conso_mois_immo_jh, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(s.consoft,12,' '),s.consoft )conso_mois_immo_eur_ft, decode(:p_param6,'.TXT',lpad(nvl(s.consoenv,0),12,' '),nvl(s.consoenv,0) )conso_mois_immo_eur_env FROM stock_ra s, &p_from ligne_bip l, dossier_projet_copi dpc, proj_info pi, struct_info si, struct_info si_ress, dossier_projet dp, centre_activite ca, ressource r, type_etape te, copi_axe_strategique axe, copi_type_financement fin WHERE s.pid = l.pid AND l.icpi = pi.icpi AND pi.dp_copi = dpc.dp_copi (+) AND l.dpcode = dp.dpcode AND l.arctype = 'T1' AND l.typproj = '1' AND si.codsg = s.codsg AND s.codcamo = ca.codcamo AND si_ress.codsg = s.codsgress AND s.typetap = te.typetap AND te.top_immo = 'O' AND r.ident = s.ident AND dpc.axe_strategique = axe.numero (+) AND dpc.type_financement = fin.numero (+)
&p_where

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , lpad ( nvl ( dp.typdp , ' ' ) , 2 , ' ' ) , dp.typdp )
decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , lpad ( nvl ( to_char ( dp.datimmo , 'DD/MM/YYYY' ) , ' ' ) , 10 , ' ' ) , dp.datimmo )
decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , lpad ( nvl ( dpc.dp_copi , ' ' ) , 6 , 0 ) , dpc.dp_copi )
decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , rpad ( nvl ( axe.libelle , ' ' ) , 50 , ' ' ) , axe.libelle )
decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , rpad ( nvl ( fin.libelle , ' ' ) , 50 , ' ' ) , fin.libelle )

DECODE ( : P_PARAM0 , 'fournisseur' , DECODE ( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe ( s.codsgress , : P_PERIME ) , 'O' , decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , rpad ( r.rnom , 30 , ' ' ) , r.rnom ) , DECODE ( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi ( si_ress.cafi , : P_PERIM_CAFI ) , 'N' , '' , decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , rpad ( r.rnom , 30 , ' ' ) , r.rnom ) ) ) , '' )

DECODE ( : P_PARAM0 , 'fournisseur' , DECODE ( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe ( s.codsgress , : P_PERIME ) , 'O' , nvl ( s.niveau , ' ' ) , DECODE ( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi ( si_ress.cafi , : P_PERIM_CAFI ) , 'N' , '' , nvl ( s.niveau , ' ' ) ) ) , '' )
decode ( s.soccode , 'SG..' , decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , lpad ( 0 , 12 , ' ' ) , 0 ) , decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , lpad ( s.coutftht , 12 , ' ' ) , s.coutftht ) )
decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , lpad ( nvl ( s.coutenv , 0 ) , 12 , ' ' ) , nvl ( s.coutenv , 0 ) )
decode ( : p_param6 , '.TXT' , lpad ( nvl ( s.consoenv , 0 ) , 12 , ' ' ) , nvl ( s.consoenv , 0 ) )

function.name: afterpform
